mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.link, p.custom_link, p.title, p.cover_url, p.create_time FROM t_post p WHERE p.is_publish = 1 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND p.create_time < ( SELECT create_time FROM t_post WHERE id = #{id} ) ORDER BY p.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.id, p.link, p.custom_link, p.title, p.cover_url, p.create_time FROM t_post p WHERE p.is_publish = 1 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND p.create_time > ( SELECT create_time FROM t_post WHERE id = #{id} ) ORDER BY p.create_time ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.summary, p.author, p.cover_url, p.link, p.publish_date, p.year, p.month, p.day, p.read_num, p.praise_num, p.is_comment AS comment, p.is_top AS top, p.is_delete AS `delete`, p.tags FROM t_post p INNER JOIN t_post_tag pt ON p.id = pt.post_id WHERE pt.tag_id = #{tagId} AND p.is_publish = 1 AND p.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
